title: Remove app icon/logo

requirements.text: Remove the custom favicon link from frontend/index.html and revert to default/no favicon
acceptanceCriteria: The custom favicon link tag is removed from frontend/index.html
No custom icon or logo is displayed in the browser tab

requirements.text: Remove any generated icon/logo image files from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: All custom icon/logo files are deleted from the assets directory

constraints: Preserve all other frontend functionality and styling
nonGoals: Adding a new icon or logo
